name: Platonic Pirates
description:
Minimalist TTRPG about parrots, piracy and the art of platonic love.
For 3 or 4 players, plus 1 GM.

PLATONIC PIRATES by ladyorthetiger is built on CALTROP CORE EX by titanomachyRPG via CC Attribution 4.0 International License.

Made for Caltrop Jam 3: The Anniversary and supported by the Caltrop Core Microgrant.
